Condition_summary_1: mitigation measures including fish rescue reporting, habitat offsetting, and compliance with SARA
Condition_summary_2: monitoring and reporting requirements for both mitigation and offsetting measures, including annual reports with data and photographs
Condition_summary_3: implementation of offsetting measures to enhance habitats such as walleye spawning areas and rock shoals
Condition_summary_4: prohibition on transferring authorization and legal consequences for non-compliance
Habitat_Type: river, lake, shoreline, spawning, resting, foraging
Offset_footprint_size: 880 m2 (river habitat from old dam removal), 400 m2 (walleye spawning with rock shoal), 895 m2 (shoreline re-profiling), 720 m2 (lake to river habitat conversion)
Boulder: installation of boulders as contingency for washed-out spawning areas
